first_para: Caroline Fiona Ellen Nokes (née Perry) (born 26 June 1972), MP, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. She is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Romsey and Southampton North in Hampshire, and is Parliamentary Private Secretary at the Department for Work and Pensions

full.extract:
Caroline Fiona Ellen Nokes (née Perry) (born 26 June 1972), MP, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. She is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Romsey and Southampton North in Hampshire, and is Parliamentary Private Secretary at the Department for Work and Pensions
^ "Caroline Nokes MP". BBC Democracy Live (BBC). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251195/
^ "List of Members returned to serve in Parliament at the General Election 2010". London Gazette. 13 May 2010. Retrieved 29 May 2010. 
^ "Caroline Nokes". Conservative Party website. Retrieved 7 May 2010. 
^ http://m.dailyecho.co.uk/news/11363182.MP_Caroline_Nokes_lands_first_Government_job_in_reshuffle/
full.title: Caroline Nokes
